title: Ticket?
body: How long does it take for someone to get to my ticket and assist me?

replies.body:
It all depends on the current influx of tickets. Lately, we had a bit of an issue with the Your Shop going a little wonky, so that generated a good deal of tickets and slowed the response time. 

On average, the NA ticket response time is about 12 hours.
Will it still be okay if I sent out a ticket about 2 days ago?

Yep! That means that we should be getting to yours soon if not already. The team that will be answering your ticket has, admittedly, been a little swamped lately, but I see your ticket now and it should be getting an answer by tomorrow.
Tickets usually take around a few hours to be received, read, and answered by Riot. But it could take longer depending on the day.
